text.text: Due to copyright issues, I could not simply include all the contents from other authors in this book unless the reader also owns the source book. Using the magic of gold, I managed to make the book automatically add new sections as you create the other books.
To get the full contents of this book, you will need to obtain copies of Materials and You, Puny Smelting, Mighty Smelting, Fantastic Foundry, and Tinkers' Gadgetry.
